title: Dunkirk and the Fall of Paris
description: The German army outflanks the British Expeditionary Force (BEF) and forces the epic retreat of Dunkirk as Paris falls to Hitler’s forces.
itunes:subtitle: The German army forces the epic retreat of Dunkirk as Paris falls to Hitler’s forces.
itunes:summary: The German army outflanks the British Expeditionary Force (BEF) and forces the epic retreat of Dunkirk as Paris falls to Hitler’s forces.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
